seriesStories.title: Ireland take series after washout
seriesStories.subTitle: Ireland v Kenya, 3rd ODI, Belfast
seriesStories.summary: Ireland's third ODI against Kenya was washed out in Belfast

seriesStories.title: Ouma fined for showing dissent
seriesStories.subTitle: Kenya in England, Ireland, Scotland and Netherlands 2008
seriesStories.summary: Kenyan keeper guilty of breaching clause 1.2 of the ICC Code of Conduct

seriesStories.title: Rain ruins second one-dayer
seriesStories.subTitle: Ireland v Kenya, 2nd ODI, Belfast
seriesStories.summary: Ireland's second ODI against Kenya was washed out in Belfast

seriesStories.title: Botha stars in Ireland win
seriesStories.subTitle: Ireland v Kenya, 1st ODI, Belfast
seriesStories.summary: Kenya's miserable tour of Britain continued on Sunday with a 33-run defeat by Ireland in the first of three ODIs

seriesStories.title: Netherlands coast to easy win
seriesStories.subTitle: Netherlands v Kenya, only ODI, Rotterdam
seriesStories.summary: Netherlands bounced back from their crushing defeat in last week's four-day game to cruise to a six-wicket win over Kenya in a rain-affected ODI in Rotterdam
